alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Orange and north central Osceola Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 307 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Lake Hart, or 7 miles southwest of Wedgefield, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Wedgefield, Avalon Park, Orlando International Airport and Conway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
